title: Record of assessments
description: This document records the details of an assessment

CountyEntityID.description: The unique identifier for the county

LEAEntityID.description: The unique identifier for the LEA

SchoolEntityID.description: The unique identifier for the school

CharterSchool.description: The charter status of the school

AlternativeSchool.description: The alternative status of the school

FAYStatus.description: The FAY status of the school

ContentArea.description: The content area of the assessment

ContentAreaDef.description: The type of content area assessment

TestLevel.description: The test level of the assessment

TestLevelDef.description: The type of test level assessment

SubgroupID.description: The unique identifier for the subgroup

PCTPassing.description: The percentage of students passing PCTPL3 and PCTPL4

PCTPL1.description: The percentage of students at performance level 1

PCTPL2.description: The percentage of students at performance level 2

PCTPL3.description: The percentage of students at performance level 3

PCTPL4.description: The percentage of students at performance level 4
